thread.title: North Korea vows to dismantle nuclear test site within weeks, invites world press to watch

author: Kcna
title: North Korea vows to dismantle nuclear test site within weeks, invites world press to watch
text:
KCNA | Reuters A view of the newly developed intercontinental ballistic rocket Hwasong-15. North Korea has scheduled the dismantlement of its nuclear test site for sometime between May 23 and 25 depending on weather conditions in order to uphold its pledge to discontinue nuclear tests, state media said on Saturday.
The country's central news agency said the dismantlement of the nuclear test ground would involve collapsing all of its tunnels with explosions, blocking its entrances and removing all observation facilities, research buildings and security posts.
Journalists from other countries, including the United States and South Korea, will be invited to cover the event.
